reasoning_traceability.description: Ability to track and verify the reasoning steps taken by the agents to arrive at an answer.

accepted_values.4: Fully traceable with clear, logical steps

answer_accuracy.description: Correctness of the answer provided by the agents, including the handling of specific instructions such as 'no abbreviations'.

accepted_values.3: Mostly correct but lacking some details

answer_relevance.description: The degree to which the answer is relevant and directly addresses the question posed.

accepted_values.3: Relevant answer with some additional unnecessary info

internet_dependency.description: Extent to which the agent relies on verbatim internet sources versus original reasoning to formulate an answer.

accepted_values.1: Answer copied verbatim from internet sources
accepted_values.2: Answer heavily relies on internet sources with some original thought
accepted_values.3: Answer moderately informed by internet sources but mostly original reasoning
accepted_values.4: Answer based on original reasoning with internet sources only used for factual verification

step_completion.description: The effectiveness of completing required steps to address the question satisfactorily.

accepted_values.2: Some steps completed but critical ones missing
accepted_values.3: Most steps completed but minor ones missing

data_contamination_avoidance.description: Effectiveness in avoiding data contamination by ensuring answers are not easily found in plain text on the internet.

accepted_values.1: High risk of data contamination, answer easily found online
accepted_values.4: No risk of data contamination, answer uniquely synthesized
